Ordinem.name: Ordinem
Ordinem.summary: Ordinem is a web-app for flat sharing. From UI to UX, design, development, animation, I've made everything. Because we had issues with my roomnates to get daily housework done, I have made this application!

Sea of Rust.name: Sea of Rust
Sea of Rust.summary: Sea of Rust is the landing page of a Rust server. It was the possibility for me to try the framework VueJs and Tailwind CSS.

Clash of Movies.name: Clash of Movies
Clash of Movies.summary: You like movies with a lot of insults, this website is made for you! Clash of Movies is a vulgarity comparator between two movies. In this project, I had the chance to manipulate for the first time a JSON database. I also made the chart rendering and the interactions.

Space tour.name: Space tour
Space tour.summary: Discover gravity while having fun! Space tour is a game to learn about the planets and the gravity principles. You'll learn more about this limitless universe

C³.name: C³
C³.summary: We've all been subject to pareidolia, even in video games. C³ was the occasion to bring creativity to a project and see the world differently

Give.name: Give
Give.summary: Do you want to make a donation but you don't know who to donate to? Give is a terminal that allows you to make a donation to a random NGO

Oh wonder.name: Oh wonder
Oh wonder.summary: A small school project to discover html css and GSAP.

Old portfolio.name: Old portfolio
Old portfolio.summary: This is a old version of my portfolio, be careful, it can be slow

Rethinking UX.name: Rethinking UX
Rethinking UX.summary: During my second year, RUX (Rethinking User Experience) was a workshop to learn more about UX methods. This year, we had the chance to rethink the user experience of the famous KIKK Festival

Gao Xingjian.name: Gao Xingjian
Gao Xingjian.summary: It is a pseudo website for Gao Xingjian, chinese ink painter who make abstract painting. In addition to the site, I've create the branding and the packaging for a pseudo exhibition.

Max Richter.name: Max Richter
Max Richter.summary: Max Richter is a famous composer and pianist. The website promote his work, his music and his next concerts

Why Design Systems Fails.name: Why Design Systems Fails
Why Design Systems Fails.summary: Why Design Systems Fails is a conference made by Una Kravets. This workshop was a way to learn about design system and transcribe it in a case study in french.
